name: Summer League Cutoff
description: PS: ⭐️ I’m a Season 8 Knit Star! ⭐️ Shop this season’s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window April 21-30 here.
full_text: PS: ⭐️ I’m a Season 8 Knit Star! ⭐️ Shop this season’s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window April 21-30 here . A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here. The Summer League Cutoff is a crewneck raglan tee that evokes memories of summer sports and a general sense of nostalgia. The doubled ribbed neckband, v-insert neck triangle, and rolled hems give personality and add to the classic appeal of this sweatshirt-inspired wardrobe staple. Meant to be well-loved and well-worn, this cutoff has the perfect broken-in relaxed fit that allows for chic comfort and wearable ease. Shop the full kit here. SIZES XS (S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL) Suggested ease: 4-6”/10-15cm Pictured in size S on model with 34”/86.5cm bust FINISHED DIMENSIONS Bust circumference: 34.25 (38.75, 42.25, 46.75, 50.25, 54.75, 60, 64.5)”/87 (98, 107, 118.5, 127.5, 139, 152.5, 163.5)cm Length: 18.25 (19, 19.75, 20.5, 21.75, 22.5, 23.5, 24.5)”/46.5 (48, 50, 52.5, 55, 57.5, 59.5, 62.5)cm DIFFICULTY LEVEL Intermediate SKILLS The knit stitch Purl stitch M1r M1l Traveling stitches Working in the round Picking up and knitting stitches Mattress stitch seaming All patterns are written in standard US terms. Sign up for info on special offers, sales, and new pattern releases: bit.ly/TOWnewsletter CONNECT Instagram: @twoofwands Facebook: facebook.com/twoofwands Pinterest: pinterest.com/twoofwandsknits Youtube: youtube.com/twoofwandsknits HELP Join the Crew of Wands Facebook group to connect with other makers of Two of Wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions. SELLING FINISHED ITEMS Small batch sales of finished pieces made from this pattern are permitted, but seller must use their own photographs and credit must be given to Two of Wands as the designer.
